text: Ruram d'Medani is the spiritual leader of the [[Voice of Aureon]] sect within House [[Medani]], which trains the oracles known as [[Medani prophet]]s. His magical abilities are not as powerful as those of other members of the order, but Ruramâ€™s prophetic visions are strong and his advice is sound.
title: Ruram d'Medani
tags: half-elf Medani humanoid Wroat [[Voice of Aureon]] [[Medani prophet]]
